altername_name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS: Ore ga Boss!: Saikyou Family Taisen
name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Ore ga Boss! Saikyou Family Taisen
overview: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Ore ga Boss! Saikyou Family Taisen is a Simulation game, developed and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2009.
